product_description.product_range: Western Australia - Main Roads Metro - ECOPact Range
product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging

lca_information.time_representativeness: 2017 calendar year production data, 2023 calendar year mix data
databases_and_software_used: Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI) (2018)
Global Cement and Concrete (GCCA) EPD Tool Project Database version 3.1 (2021)
lca_information.allocation: Physical allocation based on weight or m³ of concrete; economic allocation for ground granulated blast furnace slag

scenarios: Disposal of concrete at a landfill site
Reuse of recovered concrete elements in new construction works
Use of concrete debris in land restoration

carbon_emission_context.carbonation: Concrete absorbs CO2 from the atmosphere through a chemical reaction, reducing net CO2 emissions over its lifetime

additional_info.about_holcim: Holcim Australia is a leading supplier of construction materials, with a focus on sustainability and net-zero targets by 2050.
additional_info.virodecs_special: Provides project-specific, on-demand EPDs for ready-mix concrete, backed by EPD Process Certification.
